us.aaronweiss.juicebot
Interface IBot

All Known Implementing Classes:
AutoBot, Bot, JuiceBot, MultiServerBot, SweetieBot
public interface IBot

The basic interface describing an IRC bot.

Since:
1.0
Version:
1.0
Author:
Aaron Weiss

Method Summary
 void connect()
          Initiates the bot, making it connect to the desired server.
 void disconnect()
          Disconnects the bot from the server.
 Configuration getConfiguration()
          Gets the configuration map for the bot.
 boolean isConnected()
          Gets whether or not the bot is currently connected.
 void onConnect(org.jboss.netty.channel.Channel session)
          Performs the desired actions on connect.
 void onDisconnect()
          Performs the desired actions on disconnect.
 void onMessage(java.lang.String[] message)
          Performs the desired actions on message received.
 void periodic()
          Performs the desired actions periodically, according to BOT_PERIODIC.
 void write(java.lang.String message)
          Writes a message to the server.
 

Method Detail

onConnect

void onConnect(org.jboss.netty.channel.Channel session)
Performs the desired actions on connect.

Parameters:
session - the newly connected to channel

onMessage

void onMessage(java.lang.String[] message)
Performs the desired actions on message received.

Parameters:
message - the message received, split by spaces.

onDisconnect

void onDisconnect()
Performs the desired actions on disconnect.

periodic

void periodic()
Performs the desired actions periodically, according to BOT_PERIODIC.

connect

void connect()
Initiates the bot, making it connect to the desired server.

write

void write(java.lang.String message)
Writes a message to the server.

Parameters:

disconnect

Disconnects the bot from the server.

isConnected

Gets whether or not the bot is currently connected.

Returns:

getConfiguration

Gets the configuration map for the bot.

Returns:
